Modification_Detail.description: This version_id matches the Mars 2020 internal processing version number, which provides consistency and tracability across both ops and archive products. Lower-numbered versions of this product thus may not be present in this collection. The collection inventory lists all the versions of this product in the collection.

Internal_Reference.comment: This is the PDS4 logical identifier for the Mars2020 Mission.

Table_Delimited.name: LASER SHOT POSITIONS
Table_Delimited.description: Laser shot positions for each ACI image

Field_Delimited.name: Image_name
Field_Delimited.description: The image filename associated with the laser shot locations

Field_Delimited.name: x
Field_Delimited.description: The sample number (x value) of the laser shot location on the ACI image

Field_Delimited.name: y
Field_Delimited.description: The line number (y value) of the laser shot location on the ACI image

Table_Delimited.name: SPECTRAL INTENSITY
Table_Delimited.description: Integrated intensity for a specified, configurable, wavelength range

Field_Delimited.name: Spectral_intensity_0
Field_Delimited.description: The integrated spectral intensity for the specified wavelength region

Field_Delimited.name: Spectral_intensity_1
Field_Delimited.description: The integrated spectral intensity for the specified wavelength region

Field_Delimited.name: Spectral_intensity_2
Field_Delimited.description: The integrated spectral intensity for the specified wavelength region

Field_Delimited.name: Spectral_intensity_3
Field_Delimited.description: The integrated spectral intensity for the specified wavelength region

Field_Delimited.name: Spectral_intensity_4
Field_Delimited.description: The integrated spectral intensity for the specified wavelength region

Field_Delimited.name: Spectral_intensity_5
Field_Delimited.description: The integrated spectral intensity for the specified wavelength region

Table_Delimited.name: WAVELENGTH REGIONS
Table_Delimited.description: Configurable wavelength regions to apply spectral integration

Field_Delimited.name: Column_index
Field_Delimited.description: The wavelength index associated with the spectral intensity columns in the SPECTRAL_INTENSITY table

Field_Delimited.name: Wavelength_start
Field_Delimited.description: The starting location of the wavelength region of interest

Field_Delimited.name: Wavelength_stop
Field_Delimited.description: The end location of the wavelength region of interest
